input.sentences: the bride looked very pretty that night .
[female] was surrounded by good looking men .
three generations of the [male] family were at the wedding .
the turnout was great and everyone was happy .
[male] ended the night by chatting with [male] .
output.sentences: I planned a beautiful wedding for a baseball player.
The bride was surrounded by the men of his team.
With generations of his team's roster there, the bride had few women to talk to.
That day she was happy with the turnout.
But the groom spent that night chatting with her sister.
